Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a string telephone device that connects two students.
The student can show how sound travels through the string to communicate information.
The student can depict that the communication travels over a distance between the two students.
The student can ensure the drawing includes only the specific tools and materials used to create the device.
The student can represent how the device solves the problem of communicating over a distance.
